Detailed Description

Class for testing that CHP files are the same +/- some epsilon.

Also checks to make sure that at least some of the headers are the same (times/dates/versions change so not checked).

CalvinChpCheck::CalvinChpCheck ( std::vector< std::string > &  generated,
std::vector< std::string > &  gold,
int  diffAllowed = 0,
const std::wstring &  prefix = L"apt-",
double  eps = 0.0001,
bool  bCheckHeaders = true,
double  fraction = 0.0 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
generated - vector of filenames to be tested.
gold - matching vector of filenames for gold standard data to test against.
diffAllowed - number of differences allowed
prefix - argument name prefix in header (default: "apt-")
eps - epsilon: Maximum accepted absolute difference in numeric values. i.e. if |generated-gold| >= eps then there is a difference.
bCheckHeaders Check headers? (boolean, default: true).
frac - Maximum accepted fractional difference in numeric values (not used by default). i.e. if |generated-gold| >= frac*max(|generated|,|gold|) then there is a difference.

Todo:
allow for a vector of eps for checking extra metrics
